title: LF Team 3v3 ranked high Plat/Diamond  Eng/Ger
body:
Hi,

I am 26 years old from Germany and can fill in any role in 3v3 (Bruiser, AP, Jungle, ADC, Sup).
I already have some experience in Diamond 1 3v3 from Season 3. 

My internet connection is stable, i got a working headset, ts3 and am able to talk to people =D
I'm very active (i am online about 5-7 days per week).

My history:
I almost didnt play in Season 4/5 and returned to LoL about 2 Month ago.
Back then i've  been Plat2 in SoloQ. 
At the moment im upranking again from Silver 5 - dropped there because of inactiveness.
Now I am in Gold 3 SoloQ but my main focus is to reach at least a solid diamond rank in 3v3.
So i am looking for 2 other people to play several times a week and have fun with me in 3v3 ranked.


If you think you want to play some games with me or have some questions in general, just add me in League.

I#m hoping for some quick reply -

sTyX
